summary: Request to publish YARD documentation to Vercel for the Ruby SDK. The issue is closed as no longer applicable due to SDK rewrite.
userImpact: Users cannot access published YARD documentation online for the Ruby SDK.
rootCause: SDK was undergoing rewrite and this documentation deployment was deprioritized.
resolutionDetails: Issue no longer applicable due to SDK rewrite/refresh. Documentation approach likely changed in the new version.
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
